This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version . ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly, Missed analytics or tracker ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://account.adobe.com/security ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots When you turn on the `third-party authentication header block` in stealth mode, some options do not load. Tracker `https://commerce.adobe.com/amsterdam/log` `https://udps.adobe.com/fetch_user_tracking_flag` `https://prod.adobeccstatic.com/unav/1.5/AnalyticsProvider.` `https://shared-components.adobe.com/analytics/` ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> > When you turn on the `third-party authentication header block` in stealth mode, some options do not load.
> 
> Which exanlty?

@Alex-302 
If you enable the Blocking Third-Party Authentication Header option in stealth mode, you will get an error like the picture you sent above.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
